name: DirReader
tagline: Collect the content of a folder as printable list
body:
Simple SWT application to collect the content of a folder as printable list. I had implemented this in 2003 or so. 

![screenshot](images/dirreader.png)

Download the game jar from [here](download/dirreader.jar) and execute the jar either by double click or with java -jar dirreader.jar.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
